name: fhircraft
summary: Fhircraft transforms FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) specifications into type-safe Python models using Pydantic. Build healthcare applications with automatic validation, intelligent code completion, and seamless integration with Python's ecosystem.
